resources.string: There will be a 20% discount if you enter the park with 3 children!!
Tickets cost $18 a person. The Pike Ice Skating is a great place to spend with the family. Right by the shore, The Pike is full of many stores and restaurants.
Second Street has many events that take place, from boat rides to candy cane lanes. Second Street in the Winter time is one you can not miss out on.

The Los Angeles Zoo lights take place at 7pm and is fill with wonderful lights all around the zoo. It is a perfect place to take youre family and friends. Most of the animals will be asleep but some will be active and interacting with the lights at night.
Tickets cost $12 per person. If someone in your group is handicap we will give you a 10% discount!!
The Griffith Observatory is a facility in Los Angeles, California, sitting on the south-facing slope of Mount Hollywood in Los Angeles Griffith Park.

Venice Beach is a great place to spend your summer while in Los Angeles. Venice has art, pop culture, and beautiful views. You can enjoy your relaxed day at the beach or go for a run or ride a bike on the trails. The weather is always the best in Venice Beach

Santa Monica Pier is one of the most visited sites in southern California. It is rich in people, food, and art. The pier has multiple games and attractions for people to enjoy. Santa Monica Pier is a place you must go if you wish to visit Los Angeles.
